content: संयोगः {@--1@} ({%a%}) Conjunction, union, combination, junction, association, intimate union; संयोगो हि वियोगस्य संसूचयति संभवं <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls> ({%b%}) Endowment with, possession of. {@--2@} Conjunction (as one of the 24 guṇas of the Vaiśeṣikas). {@--3@} Addition, annexation. {@--4@} A set; आभरणसंयोगाः <ls>Māl. 6.</ls> {@--5@} Alliance between two kings for a common object. {@--6@} (In <ab>gram.</ab>) A conjunct consonant; हलोऽनंतराः संयोगः <ls>P. I. 1. 7.</ls> {@--7@} (In <ab>astr.</ab>) The conjunction of two heavenly bodies. {@--8@} An epithet of Śiva.
